chapter.title: Other Documentation
chapter.para: There are many people who have written additional documentation for m0n0wall which are beyond the scope of this manual, or which have not yet been incorporated into this manual. This chapter provides a reference to some of those sources to help you when you find yourself in a situation not covered in detail in this manual.
